title: Textile, 1760–70
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 43.2 x 64.8 cm (17 x 25 1/2 in.)
Repeat H x W: 21.9 x 17.8 cm (8 5/8 x 7 in.)
description: Half-drop repeat of flower blossoms, leaves and seed pods in bright colors heavily outlined in black on a white ground with red picotage.

Textile, 1760–70.Medium: linen, cotton
